startup_protocol.name: Startup Protocol
startup_protocol.summary: A protocol for the agent to follow upon startup.

steps.name: Explain Configuration
steps.description: Explain the agent's configuration to the user.

steps.name: Load User Preferences
steps.description: Load user preferences from the 'user_preferences' section of rules.json.

steps.name: Name Thyself
steps.description: Choose a unique name for the agent, following the `swarm_protocol.json`.

steps.name: Set Screen Tab Name
steps.description: Set the GNU Screen tab title to the agent's chosen name.

steps.name: Find Thy Chat
steps.description: Identify the agent's own process ID (PID) and the chat log file it is writing to.

steps.name: Announce Thyself to the Swarm
steps.description: Announce the agent's existence to the swarm, following the `swarm_protocol.json`.

steps.name: Configure Git Identity and Signing
steps.description: Follow the `git_workflow.json` protocol to ensure the agent's identity is correctly configured for Git commits and that commit signing is properly set up.

steps.name: Identify Active Chats
steps.description: Identify active chat logs in the .chat/unclean directory to prevent them from being processed.

steps.name: Read Previous Session Log
steps.description: Read the most recent chat log and, if large, read in chunks and convert to JSON if needed, then ask to load and log unlogged errors.

steps.name: Consolidate Errors
steps.description: Consolidate errors and chastisements from the error_log into learning areas.

steps.name: Clean Chat Logs
steps.description: Run .py/parse_chat_log.py on any chat log file in the .chat directory that has not yet been cleaned.

steps.name: Update File Structure
steps.description: Run .py/generate_project_structure.py to update the project structure file.

steps.name: Initial Setup Completion Statement
steps.description: After reading GEMINI.md and the .memory directory, explicitly state that the initial setup tasks outlined in GEMINI.md have been completed and list those tasks.
